title: Cisco Secure Endpoint - Event
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into the event logs generated by Cisco Secure Endpoint.

definition.content:
# Overview

   
- This dashboard provides detailed insights into the event logs generated by Cisco Secure Endpoint.

# Widgets
1. Total Event Count 
2. Events Generation Over Time 
3. Events Distribution by Type 
4. Events Distribution by Severity 
5. Events Distribution Over Geo-Location 
6. Event Log Details 
7. Blocklisted and Malicious Files by Techniques 
8. Blocklisted and Malicious Files by Tactics 
9. Top 10 Active Files 
10. Top 10 Active Tactics 
11. Top 10 Active Techniques 
12. File Details 
13. Top 10 Active Detections 
14. Event Count by Detection and Severity 
15. Detection Details 
16. Scan Details 
17. Top 10 Active User 
18. Top 10 Active Endpoint's Hostname 
19. Top 10 Endpoint's Policy by Critical Severity Event 
20. Events by Endpoint's Policy 
21. Events of Compromised Endpoint by Event Type 
22. Events of Non-Compromised Endpoint by Event Type 
23. Blocklisted and Malicious Files by Endpoint's Policy 
24. Blocklisted and Malicious Files by Endpointâ€™s Operating System 
25. Event Count by Endpoint's Operating System and Event Type 
26. Event Count by Endpoint Details
